participant_1.background:
I am not tall, but my brother is.
I used to be a farmer, but I had to give up the farm to pursue my passion for teaching.
i was adopted.
my name is nick.
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy drinking coffee while watching the sunrise from my balcony, and then I spend the rest of the day doing yoga and writing in my journal.
i look down on people who did not.
I am a strong person who has big dreams and I am not going to let my anxiety get in the way.
I climbed a local mountain with my friends for my birthday.
I treasure my ability to swim.

content.text: Good! I just climbed a local mountain with my friends for my birthday. It was amazing!
Oh wow! That sounds amazing! I have always wanted to climb a mountain but I am not sure where to start.
There are a lot of resources online that can help you get started. I used a website called mountainproject.com to find a mountain that was close to me and had a good trail.
That is a great idea! I will definitely check that out. I am really impressed that you climbed a mountain for your birthday! That is something to be proud of.
Thank you! It was a lot of hard work but it was so worth it.
I am sure it was. I have never been one for heights, but maybe I will give it a try one day.
I think you should! It is a really rewarding experience.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the inspiration!
No problem! I am glad I could help.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to drink coffee while watching the sunrise from my balcony, and then I spend the rest of the day doing yoga and writing in my journal.
That sounds really relaxing! I love yoga too. I am not very good at it, but I always feel good after I do it.
It is so relaxing! I am glad you like yoga too.
Me too! I have always wanted to learn how to swim.
Swimming is a great skill to have! It is so much fun and it is a great way to exercise.
It does sound like fun! I will have to look into taking some lessons.
That is a great idea! You will love it.
